revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox dungeon |name = Rock Peak Ruins |image = [[File:Rock Peak Ruins.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Rock Peak Ruins. |tokens = 1,920,000 |location = Southeast of Giants Bed }} '''Rock Peak Ruins''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 31,507,840 HP. ==..."
